The Product Cards pattern displays multiple cards in a horizontal layout. The HTML structure follows the standard [Card]({{internalLink '/components/detail/card'}}) and [Grid Card Layout]({{internalLink '/components/detail/card-layout--grid'}}) markup with modifications highlighted below. It is recommended to read through the Card and Grid Card Layout documentation as a prerequisite to the content below.

Product Cards leverage the following components:

- [Grid card layout]({{internalLink '/components/detail/card-layout--grid'}})
- [Card]({{internalLink '/components/detail/card'}})
- [Image]({{internalLink '/components/detail/images'}})
- [Heading]({{internalLink '/components/detail/headings'}}) (Heading will be a hyperlink)
- [Badge]({{internalLink '/components/detail/badge'}}) (optional)
- [Material color]({{internalLink '/components/detail/materials'}}) (optional)
- [Depth]({{internalLink '/components/detail/utilities-depth--static'}}) (optional)
- [Sale Price]({{internalLink '/components/detail/sale-price'}}) (optional)

There are three types of Product Cards **Apps**, **Games**, and **Devices**. Properties in the implementation below will call out which card(s) they apply to.

## Required elements (all card types)

- Section heading or section aria-label
- Image
- Heading (hyperlink)
  - **60 character limit**

### Optional elements

- Badge (authorable)
- Sale price
- Description
  - **90 character limit**

## Implementation

- Backplate (background color) can support any color. A color utility or `.material-*` class **must be placed outside** of the grid `.container` and any other grid classes so it can span the full width of the page.

```html
<!-- Section -->
<section aria-label="aria label placeholder for products">
  <!-- Section heading -->
  <h3 class="h2 mb-4">Product placement channel heading</h3>
  <!-- Row -->
  <ul class="row row-cols-2 row-cols-sm-3 row-cols-md-4 row-cols-lg-6 list-unstyled my-0 mx-n2">
    <!-- Card container -->
    <li class="col mb-4 mb-lg-0 px-2">
      <!-- Card -->
      <div class="card h-100 material-card depth-none depth-8-hover pb-4" data-mount="click-group">
        <!-- Card image container -->
        <div class="img-flex-auto">
          <picture>
            <source srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/198x198" media="(min-width: 1400px)" />
            <source srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/158x158" media="(min-width: 1084px)" />
            <source srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/133x133" media="(min-width: 860px)" />
            <source srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/238x238" media="(min-width: 540px)" />
            <img
              src="https://via.placeholder.com/132x132"
              class="card-img"
              alt="placeholder text to concisely describe the image"
            />
          </picture>
        </div>
        <!-- Card header (if badge) -->
        <div class="card-header pt-3 px-3">
          <!-- Badge (optional) -->
          <span class="badge bg-yellow mb-2">New</span>
        </div>
        <div class="card-body px-3">
          <!-- Card heading hyperlink -->
          <h4 class="base mb-2">
            <a href="#" aria-label="Surface Pro 7 i7/16GB RAM/1TB SSD + Type Cover Bundle - Save $100 off purchase"
              >Surface Pro 7 i7/16GB RAM/1TB SSD + Type Cover Bundle&hellip;</a
            >
          </h4>
          <!-- Price container (optional) -->
          <div class="mb-1">
            <!-- â€¦ [Sale Price here] -->
          </div>
          <!-- Description container (optional) -->
          <p>
            The smarter way to listen. Music and calls sound spectacular with active noise cancellation, rich
            audio&hellip;
            <span class="sr-only"
              >Select Surface Pro 7 i7/16GB RAM/1TB SSD + Type Cover Bundle - Save $100 off purchase for more
              information</span
            >
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </li>
    <!-- up to 6 cards -->
    ...
  </ul>
</section>
```

### Section

The section must either contain an aria-label property **OR** a heading.

#### Optional properties (All card types)

| Property     | Value      | Description                                                                                                     |
| ------------ | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| HTML Element | `<h{1-6}>` | Use tag appropriate for heading hierarchy in the document.                                                      |
| aria-label   | text       | Descriptive text describing the section of items. Aria-label should be used if the heading element is not used. |

### Section heading

The section must either contain an aria-label property **OR** a heading.

#### Optional properties (All card types)

| Property     | Value      | Description                                                                                                     |
| ------------ | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| HTML Element | `<h{1-6}>` | Use tag appropriate for heading hierarchy in the document.                                                      |
| class        | `h2`       | Style heading as an H2.                                                                                         |
|              | `mb-4`     | Applies spacing.                                                                                                |
| aria-label   | text       | Descriptive text describing the section of items. Aria-label should be used if the heading element is not used. |

### Row

#### Required properties (All card types)

Use either `<div>` or `<ul>` HTML element depending on the number of product cards

| Property     | Value   | Description                                           |
| ------------ | ------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| HTML Element | `<div>` | Use `<div>` when there are less than 3 product cards. |
| HTML Element | `<ul>`  | Use `<ul>` when there are 3 more product cards.       |
| class        | `mx-n2` | Fixes grid alignment.                                 |

#### Required properties (Devices)

| Property | Value                                                      | Description                     |
| -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| class    | `row row-cols-2 row-cols-sm-3 row-cols-md-4 row-cols-lg-5` | Applies column stacking styles. |

#### Required properties (Apps and Games)

| Property | Value                                                      | Description                     |
| -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| class    | `row row-cols-2 row-cols-sm-3 row-cols-md-4 row-cols-lg-6` | Applies column stacking styles. |

#### Optional properties (All card types)

| Property | Value                | Description                                                                       |
| -------- | -------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| class    | `list-unstyled my-0` | Add classes **ONLY** when `<ul>` is used; Removes default list and margin styles. |

### Card container

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property     | Value           | Description                                           |
| ------------ | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| HTML Element | `<div>`         | Use `<div>` when a `<div>` is being used for **Row**. |
| HTML Element | `<li>`          | Use `<li>` when a `<ul>` is being used for **Row**.   |
| class        | `col mb-4 px-2` | Applies arrangement styles.                           |

### Card

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property   | Value             | Description                                                                   |
| ---------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| class      | `card h-100 pb-4` | Applies default card styles.                                                  |
|            | `depth-8-hover`   | Applies default on hover styles.                                              |
| data-mount | `click-group`     | Initializes [Click Group]({{internalLink '/components/detail/click-group'}}). |

#### Optional properties (All card types)

| Property | Value              | Description                                                                                                                                    |
| -------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| class    | `material-card`    | Applies white background color.                                                                                                                |
|          | `material-surface` | Use `material-surface` as next option, but refer to [Material color]({{internalLink '/components/detail/materials'}}) for other valid options. |
|          | `depth-4`          | Applies depth style (box shadow); Should be applied by default if white card class (`.material-card`) is used.                                 |
|          | `depth-none`       | Removes depth style; Should **NOT** be applied if white card class (`.material-card`) is used.                                                 |

#### Optional properties (Devices)

| Property | Value            | Description                                                  |
| -------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| class    | `card-alt-hover` | Applies hover effect **ONLY** if there is a secondary image. |

### Card image container

### Image sizes (Apps)

Aspect ratio of images should be **1:1**.

- VP5: 256x256
- VP4: 200x200
- VP3: 256x256
- VP2: 270x270
- VP1: 252x252

### Image sizes (Games)

Aspect ratio of images should be **2:3**.

- VP5: 256x384
- VP4: 200x300
- VP3: 256x384
- VP2: 270x405
- VP1: 252x378

### Image sizes (Devices)

- VP5: 310x254
- VP4: 242x199
- VP3: 256x210
- VP2: 270x222
- VP1: 252x207

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property | Value           | Description               |
| -------- | --------------- | ------------------------- |
| class    | `img-flex-auto` | Applies alignment styles. |

### Card header (if badge)

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property | Value         | Description             |
| -------- | ------------- | ----------------------- |
| class    | `pt-3 px-3`   | Applies padding styles. |
|          | `card-header` | Applies card styles.    |

### Primary badge

- See [Badge]({{internalLink '/components/detail/badge'}}) for color options. The following defines only the Product Card requirements:

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property | Value        | Description                      |
| -------- | ------------ | -------------------------------- |
| class    | `badge mb-2` | Applies badge styles and margin. |

### Secondary badge

- See [Badge]({{internalLink '/components/detail/badge'}}) for color options. The following defines only the Product Card requirements:

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property | Value        | Description                      |
| -------- | ------------ | -------------------------------- |
| class    | `badge mb-2` | Applies badge styles and margin. |

### Card body

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property | Value            | Description          |
| -------- | ---------------- | -------------------- |
| class    | `card-body px-3` | Applies card styles. |

#### Required properties if no card header (All card types)

| Property | Value  | Description             |
| -------- | ------ | ----------------------- |
| class    | `pt-g` | Applies padding styles. |

### Card heading (within Card body)

**Limit card heading to 60 characters**

#### Required properties (All card types)

| Property     | Value       | Description                                                      |
| ------------ | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| HTML Element | `<h{1-6}>`  | Use tag appropriate for heading hierarchy in the document.       |
| class        | `base mb-2` | Applies heading text styles.                                     |
| HTML Element | `<a>`       | Anchor within the heading element to create a heading hyperlink. |
| href         | href        | Href value associated with the product call-to-action.           |
| aria-label   | text        | Product card title (non-truncated).                              |
| text         | text        | Product card title; Truncated if beyond 60 characters.           |

### Price container

#### Required properties

| Property | Value  | Description            |
| -------- | ------ | ---------------------- |
| class    | `mb-2` | Applies margin styles. |

### Description container

**Limit card heading to 90 characters**

#### Required properties (All card types; Only if character limit is reached)

| Property     | Value                          | Description                                                                                                    |
| ------------ | ------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| HTML Element | `<span class="sr-only">`       | HTML element only available to screen readers.                                                                 |
| text         | descriptive screen reader text | Screen reader text guiding users to click product to learn more. ie. "Select Surface Pro for more information" |
